thread.title: Unstable weather continues this weekend in UAE
thread.title_full: Unstable weather continues this weekend in UAE

title: Unstable weather continues this weekend in UAE
text:
Unstable weather continues this weekend in UAE Web Team /Dubai Filed on February 17, 2017 | Last updated on February 17, 2017 at 08.13 am Share 
Father and kids enjoys Cool and shady weather in Dubai. (Shihab) Be sure to bring your umbrella all the time Today's weather is looking pretty bleak according to the latest update by the National Centre of Meteorology and Seismology (NCMS). According to their latest weather update, unstable weather is set to continue this weekend after it had prevailed during the week. Rain is scattered over the country with the emirates of Dubai, Sharjah and Ras al Khaimah experiencing showers during the wee hours of Friday morning.
